title: Fried cod loin with white bean purée and garlic crisps
description: This is certainly a recipe for garlic lovers. Garlic infused purée, cod fried in garlic butter with deep-fried garlic crisps.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need a blender to make the purée.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz dried butter beans, soaked overnight, drained and rinsed
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 cod loins, about 150g/5½oz each, skin on, patted dry
